content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Mining Operation at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
Mining copper and iron ore

### Iron Mining Operation at (-19.0, -50.0) and (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Two burner mining drills (positions -19.0, -50.0 and -15.0, -50.0)
- Two storage chests (positions -18.5, -48.5 and -14.5, -48.5)
Mining iron ore

### Smelting Operation at (-6.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Three stone furnaces (positions -6.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, and 2.0, 0.0)
- Input/output chests (positions -2.5, 0.5, 0.5, 2.5, and 2.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for automation
Processing copper and iron ore into plates

### Storage Area at (6.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Three storage chests (positions 6.5, 0.5, 8.5, 0.5)
Storing various resources including iron ore, copper ore and iron plates

### Manufacturing Area at (18.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine for copper cable (position 18.5, 2.5)
- Input/output chests and inserters
- Connected to power network

### Circuit Manufacturing at (13.5, 5.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine for electronic circuits (position 13.5, 5.5)
- Input/output chests and inserters
- Connected to power network

### Power Generation at (-12.0, 20.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler (position -12.0, 20.5)
- Steam engine (position -8.5, 20.5)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Empty chests regularly to prevent "chest is full" errors
- Monitor inventory space before attempting to harvest or collect resources

### Fuel Management Errors
- Keep coal supplies available for burner devices
- Regularly check and refuel mining drills, inserters and furnaces
- Add fuel before devices run completely empty

### Resource Placement Errors
- Check target location is clear before placing new entities
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to place them

### Manufacturing Errors
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before crafting
- Use appropriate crafting facilities (furnace/assembling machine) for items that cannot be hand crafted

### Entity Interaction Errors
- Move within range of target entity before attempting to interact
- Verify entity status and requirements before interactions (fuel, ingredients, space)
